we_help_open_source_projects_gain_insigh: Comprehensive Open Source Ecosystem Evaluation System and User-Friendly SaaS Platform.
type_the_name_to_insight_into_your_proje: Type the name to insight into your project
please_enter_repository_name_or_communit: Please enter GitHub/Gitee repository name or community name
oss_compass_follows_the_best_practices_a: OSS Compass follows the best practices and specifications of the CHAOSS project, including metrics models and metrics, with some back-end components originally from Grimoirelabs.

trending.repository_weekly_activity_board_desc: This list randomly shows repositories with an increase in Activity compared to the previous week.
trending.community_weekly_activity_board_desc: This list randomly shows communities with an increase in Activity compared to the previous week.

scan_the_code_to_follow: Scan the code to follow the WeChat Official Accoun
open_source_manage_desc: Providing excellent evaluation system, reliable data and technical service support for the open governance of open source communities[to community managers, project owners, maintainers, and developers], enhancing community efficiency and promoting the healthy development of communities.
data_decision_desc: Offering in-depth data analysis and insights to organizations, OSPOs and venture investment institutions, helping them make decisions, optimize resource allocation, and detect high potential open source projects.
academic_research_desc: Providing data and analysis on open source community ecosystems[ to academic researchers], promoting research on open governance and open source software usage and providing the engineering ability and concrete practice of the transformation of academic achievements.
software_selection_desc: Providing an intelligent software evaluation system for [enterprise technology decision-makers, system architects, development teams], leveraging industry benchmark data comparison, AI-powered candidate recommendation engines, and alternative solution discovery technology to empower users in efficiently selecting the most suitable software.
